alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 4:01PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Cheyenne County in east central Colorado through 430 PM MDT... At 400 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles southwest of Cheyenne Wells, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cheyenne Wells. This includes Highway 385 between mile markers 143 and 158. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
